description: Here's why Samsung Galaxy M56 and Samsung Galaxy M16 5G are your next perfect upgrades.
title: 5 Reasons Why Samsung Galaxy M56 5G and Galaxy M16 5G are Your Next Smartphone Upgrades

description: Axiom Mission 4 has now reached the International Space Station on June 26, 2025. Launched from Kennedy Space Centre, the mission features a diverse international crew aboard SpaceX's Dragon spacecraft.
title: Axiom Mission 4 Successfully Docks on International Space Station; Shubhanshu Shukla Becomes First Indian to Reach Milestone

description: iPhone 16 price in India has dropped below Rs. 70,000, even without a trade-in. Buyers with eligible bank cards can save Rs. 4,000, thanks to a cashback offer. Meanwhile, the upcoming Amazon Prime Day 2025 sale might also offer comparable or even better deals on the iPhone 16.
title: iPhone 16 Available at Rs. 68,400 With Cashback Offer, Making It a Great Deal

description: Nothing Phone 3 will be announced on July 1, and the company has been actively dropping teasers online about the device over the past few days. The latest teaser confirms that the Phone 3 will have a 50-megapixel periscope telephoto shooter. The handset is expected to feature a triple rear camera unit.
title: Nothing Phone 3 Confirmed to Feature 50-Megapixel Periscope Telephoto Camera

description: Redmi K80 Ultra has been launched in China, with a MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ SoC and a 6.83-inch 1.5K display with a 144Hz refresh rate. It has a 7,410mAh battery with can be charged at 100W. The Redmi K80 Ultra is also equipped with a 50-megapixel primary and 8-megapixel ultrawide camera, as well a 20-megapixel selfie shooter. Read on to know more about the Redmi K80 Ultra.
title: Redmi K80 Ultra With Dimensity 9400+ SoC, 7,410mAh Battery Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Samsung Galaxy Buds Core were introduced in India on Thursday and are priced at Rs. 4,999. The TWS earphones feature dynamic drivers, ANC support, and Galaxy AI features like the Interpreter. They are claimed to be designed for comfort as they feature secure wingtips and are said to offer the best-in-segment call quality. The Galaxy Buds C ore will go on sale starting June 27.
title: Samsung Galaxy Buds Core TWS With ANC, Galaxy AI Features Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Telegram reportedly has a bot that sells sensitive personal data of Indian users to willing buyers. As per the report, the bot operates independently and shares information such as names, addresses, father’s name, and even Aadhaar, Pan Card, and Voter ID numbers. The bot reportedly lets users find the full profile data of another Indian user based on their phone number.
title: Telegram Bot Reportedly Spotted Selling Sensitive Personal Data of Indian Users

description: Vodafone Idea has rolled out the Rs. 871 Vi Max Family Plan in India, which is a postpaid option for two users. The plan includes a Netflix Basic subscription, access to other OTT platforms, and 120GB of shared monthly data with rollover benefits. The plan also offers unlimited 5G in select cities and additionally allows users to choose one entertainment and one travel or security benefit under its ‘Choice’ feature.
title: Vodafone Idea Rolls Out New Max Family Plan with Bundled Netflix Subscription: Price, Benefits

description: Anthropic released a new artificial intelligence (AI) feature for Claude on Wednesday. This new feature will allow users to create interactive AI-powered applications using the chatbot. Once created, users can also host and share these apps on the platform to let others use them. Interestingly, when others use these apps, the maker will not have to bear the application programming interface (API) charges.
title: Anthropic Now Lets Claude Users Build and Share AI-Powered Interactive Apps

description: Embark on the journey of the legendary American Journalist, Barbara Walters, as this new documentary is finally streaming on your digital screens. The film follows her life, the struggles, the pain, and more that she faced to become the ultimate icon. Watch her journey. Streaming on JioHotstar.
title: Barbara Walters: Tell Me Everything Available on JioHotstar: What You Need to Know About This American Documentary

description: Final Destination: Bloodline is now ready to hit the digital screens. It is now available for rent on Prime Video. The movie is a supernatural horror, where a college student returns home to save them from a fatal death, after she gets deadly visions. Will she be able to put an end to the visions?
title: Final Destination: Bloodlines Now Available on Rent on Prime Video

description: Lumio is set to foray into the projector category with the launch of its Arc range. At this point, we are not sure how many devices will launch under the Arc projector range. The company confirmed the naming and released a short video teaser, which shows the product looking portable enough. We will know more about the product closer to the launch, which is most likely around Prime Day.
title: Lumio Arc Projector Teased Ahead of Possible Amazon Prime Day Launch

description: Oppo K13 Turbo Pro and K13 Turbo launch is yet to be confirmed officially by the Chinese smartphone maker, but ahead of it, a Chinese tipster has suggested their launch timeline and specifications. They are tipped to come with 6.8-inch displays and 50-megapixel dual rear camera units.
title: Oppo K13 Turbo Pro, K13 Turbo Launch Timeline, Colourways Leaked; Tipped to Get 1.5K Display, Dual Rear Cameras

description: Pariwar is a Malayalam movie starring Jagadeesh, Prasanth Alexander, and Indrans as the lead. It covers the story when an old Bhaskar Pillai hits 99 and is sick, and his four sons get into a heated argument. It leads to many funny and chaotic incidents, signifying a light take over the family bonding over a material possession. It is highly engaging and a fun movie to watch with your family.
title: Pariwar Now Streaming on Amazon Prime Video: Everything You Need to Know

description: Senua’s Saga: Hellblade 2 Enhanced is releasing on PS5 on August 12, developer Ninja Theory has announced. The enhanced version of the game, which comes with added graphics and gameplay features, will also be available as a free update to players who own the game on PC or Xbox Series S/X.
title: Senua's Saga: Hellblade 2 Enhanced PS5 Release Date Announced, 60 FPS Performance Mode Confirmed

description: Sony Bravia 5 series of smart TVs has been launched in India, with sizes up to 85 inches. Powered by the XR processor, the TV features XR Backlight Master Drive, XR Contrast Booster 10, and XR Triluminos Pro. It supports Dolby Vision, Dolby Atmos, and Studio Calibrated Modes, including Prime Video. The lineup also offers Acoustic Multi-Audio, Voice Zoom 3, and gaming features like support for HDMI 2.1, VRR, and ALLM.
title: Sony Bravia 5 Series 4K Mini LED TVs With Up to 85-Inch Screen Launched: Price in India, Features

description: DreamWorks’ The Wild Robot, now streaming in Hindi on JioHotstar, tells the touching story of Roz, a robot who adapts to nature and learns to love. With powerful voice acting and a heartwarming plot, it’s a must-watch animated film with global acclaim.
title: The Wild Robot Now on Streaming on JioHotstar: A Heartfelt Tale of a Machine Finding Home in the Wild

description: Xiaomi Mix Flip 2 was launched in China as a successor to last year's Xiaomi Mix Flip. It is powered by a Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC and has a 5,165mAh battery with 50W wireless charging support. It features a 4.01-inch cover display and a 6.86-inch inner display. Both screens on the Mix Flip 2 offer 1.5 K resolution and a 120Hz refresh rate.
title: Xiaomi Mix Flip 2 With Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, 50W Wireless Charging Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Smart security device brand Ring introduced a new artificial intelligence (AI) feature on Wednesday that can analyse motion activity around a house and send text-based notifications to users. The new feature is currently only available in Canada and the US to Ring Home Premium subscribers. It supports all the currently available doorbells and cameras.
title: Amazon’s Ring Introduces AI-Powered Video Descriptions, Sends Users Quick Updates About Their Homes

description: If your Gmail inbox is cluttered with thousands of emails, managing it might seem like a Herculean task. However, Gmail offers multiple ways of freeing up your inbox. You can mass delete emails, get rid of them based on a certain type, or empty everything in your Gmail inbox. Here’s how you can do it.
title: How to Delete Emails in Bulk in Gmail Using Different Methods

description: Google’s email about changes to Gemini resulted in privacy concerns and confusion among several social media users. However, it turns out that people misunderstood the message due to an overlap between two technical terms. The Mountain View-based tech giant’s new feature for the Gemini AI assistant on Android will apparently not cause any privacy risk.
title: Gemini on Android Will Soon Connect to Apps Even If User Disables Activity Logs, Won’t Affect Privacy

description: Oppo Reno 14 Pro 5G and Reno 14 5G are confirmed to go official in India soon. Ahead of the launch, the Chinese tech brand has posted teasers, revealing the key specifications of the phones. The Oppo Reno 14 Pro 5G is teased to run on the MediaTek Dimensity 8450 chip. They will feature a 50-megapixel main rear camera.
title: Oppo Reno 14 Pro 5G, Reno 14 5G India Launch Date Revealed; Specifications Teased

description: With Qualcomm’s 3nm Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC being used on most premium and flagship Android smartphones today, the chip giant is now planning something different in the coming year. According to a source, Qualcomm will produce two unique Snapdragon 8 Elite 2 processors next year, one of which will come from Samsung Electronics Foundry. The standard chipset will still be made using TSMC’s 3nm process.
title: Qualcomm May Use Samsung Foundry to Produce Different Variants of Snapdragon Elite 2 SoC for Galaxy S26 Series

description: The Vivo TWS Air 3 Pro earphones have launched in China, priced at CNY 199 (roughly Rs. 2,400) for the base model and CNY 229 (roughly Rs. 2,700) for the long battery life version. They feature a 12mm driver, up to 50dB adaptive ANC, an IP54 rating, DeepX 3.0 stereo effect and spatial audio modes. They come with support for the LC3 codec and Bluetooth 6.0. The total battery life of the headsets is claimed to last for up to 47 or 52 hours, depending on the variant.
title: Vivo TWS Air 3 Pro With ANC, Up to 47 Hours Total Battery Life Launched: Price, Features

description: Google is rolling out a real-time captions feature for Gemini Live. The new feature lets users access Gemini Live while the device’s volume is on mute, and shows subtitles for whatever the chatbot says. The feature is available on both Android and iOS. Android users can also customise how the caption appears on the screen.
title: Gemini Live’s Real-Time Captions Feature Is Now Rolling Out to All Users

description: Microsoft and OpenAI are reportedly at odds over a contractual provision related to artificial general intelligence. Under the current terms, when OpenAI achieves AGI, Microsoft's access to such a technology would be void. Microsoft wants OpenAI to remove that clause but so far OpenAI has refused, the report said.
title: Microsoft, OpenAI Said to Be Dueling Over Artificial General Intelligence

description: A group of authors is suing Microsoft, alleging it used their books without permission to train its Megatron AI model. The complaint against Microsoft came a day after a California federal judge ruled that Anthropic made fair use under US copyright law of authors' material to train its AI systems but may still be liable for pirating their books.
title: Microsoft Sued by Authors Over Use of Books in AI Training

description: OnePlus is expanding its doorstep pickup and drop service to cover more than 19,000 PIN codes in India. An initiative under the Project Starlight, it will enable customers to get their OnePlus devices repaired without leaving their homes. Additionally, the company has also announced the OnePlus Service camp, offering free device health check-ups and software updates.
title: OnePlus Expands Doorstep Pickup and Drop Service for Repairs to More Cities in India

description: PS Plus is adding Diablo IV, The King of Fighters XV and Jusant to its monthly games lineup in July. All three titles will be available from July 1. PS Plus members have until August 4 to add the three games to their libraries.
title: PS Plus Monthly Games for July Include Diablo IV, the King of Fighters XV and Jusant

description: Samsung Smart Monitor M9 was unveiled on Wednesday, featuring QD-LED technology, a 165Hz refresh rate, and Nvidia G-Sync. This new smart monitor supports AI-powered features and will receive up to seven years of OS updates. Samsung also refreshed its Smart Monitor M8 and M7 models, both now offering 32-inch 4K Ultra HD screens and AI capabilities, enhancing their smart ecosystem.
title: Samsung Smart Monitor M9 With QD-OLED Display, AI Features Launched Alongside Updated M8 and M7 Models

description: Tecno Pova 7 5G series will launch in India on July 4. The new lineup will go on sale in the country via Flipkart. The latest smartphones will come with an AI assistant, Ella, which supports multiple Indian languages and includes an Intelligent Signal Hub System. The lineup is likely to include four models.
title: Tecno Pova 7 5G Series India Launch Set for July 4; Rear Design Teased

description: A first public test of robotaxis by Tesla in Austin, Texas led to multiple traffic problems and driving issues. The Tesla fans invited to the trial were strongly supportive and posted videos of hours of trouble-free driving, but issues drew questions from federal road safety regulators and auto safety experts.
title: Tesla's Robotaxi Peppered with Driving Mistakes in Texas Tests

description: Google rolled out the Android 16 QPR1 Beta 2.1 update for Pixel to developers and beta testers on Wednesday. It carries fixes for several bugs reported in previous updates. According to the tech giant, the update rectifies an issue that caused the back button to fail intermittently. There are also fixes for a launcher crash issue and lock screen sound to play even when switched off.
title: Android 16 QPR1 Beta 2.1 Update With Bug Fixes, June 2025 Security Patch Rolling Out for Pixel Devices

description: Gemini CLI, a command line interface for coding, was introduced by Google on Wednesday. It comes with agentic capabilities, and the tool can be used directly in the terminal, allowing ease of access and usability. Currently available for free, developers will get 60 model requests per minute and 1,000 requests a day.
title: Google Introduces Gemini CLI Open-Source AI Agent for Coding, Available to Developers for Free

description: Google's Pixel 10 is expected to be launched in August, alongside the Pixel 10 Pro, Pixel 10 Pro XL, and Pixel 10 Pro Fold models. Ahead of the formal launch, a leak has revealed the key specifications of the Pixel 10. It is said to feature a 4,970mAh battery with 29W wired charging support and 15W wireless charging support. It is likely to get a 6.3-inch display with Corning Gorilla Glass Victus 2 coating.
title: Google Pixel 10 Tipped to Pack Larger Battery Than Pixel 9; May Offer Faster Charging

description: Motorola is teasing the imminent India launch of a new smartphone, likely the Moto G96 5G. A Flipkart microsite highlights key features such as a dual rear camera unit, a curved display, and a Snapdragon chipset. The handset is teased in four colourways. The Moto G96 5G is expected to feature a curved 6.67-inch pOLED display, a Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 SoC, and a 50-megapixel dual rear camera setup.
title: Motorola Teases Upcoming Smartphone Launch in India, Could Be the Moto G96 5G

description: Realme has announced a limited-time discount on the P3x 5G handset in India. Originally priced at Rs. 13,999 and Rs. 14,999 for the 6GB+128GB and 8GB+128GB variants, the phone is now available at effective prices of Rs. 11,699 and Rs. 12,699, respectively. This includes a Rs. 1,000 price offer and a Rs. 1,300 discount coupon. The offer is valid only for June 26 and is available via Flipkart and the Realme India online store.
title: Realme P3x 5G Now Available in India With Limited-Time Discount: Check Price

description: SonicWall has warned customers about a malicious version of its SSL VPN NetExtender app that was used to steal VPN configurations and credentials. Threat actors modified two NetExtender application files, impacting organisations allowing remote network access. Both Microsoft and SonicWall have implemented measures to block the spread of these altered NetExtender versions, urging users to remain vigilant against this credential-harvesting threat.
title: SonicWall Says Malicious NetExtender Client Used to Steal VPN Credentials

description: Nothing Phone 3 is scheduled to be launched next week as the UK-based OEM’s first “truly flagship smartphone” and the successor to Nothing Phone 2. Ahead of its anticipated debut, the handset has surfaced on a benchmarking site which details several of its specifications. It is listed with an octa-core processor, which is already confirmed to be the Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 SoC, along with 16GB of RAM.
title: Nothing Phone 3 With Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 SoC Surfaces on Geekbench Ahead of Launch

description: WhatsApp has rolled out a new artificial intelligence (AI)-backed feature which can summarise messages for you. Called Message Summaries, it leverages Meta AI to help users catch up on unread texts. As per Meta, the feature uses a new technology called Private Processing which is claimed to keep the message from being read by anyone else in the chat, including Meta.
title: WhatsApp Introduces Meta AI-Powered Message Summaries to Catch Up on Unread Messages

description: July is shaping up to be an exciting month for phone enthusiasts in India. Several flagship-grade and mid-tier handsets are expected to make their debut this month. So, if you’re considering a new smartphone purchase, then it might be prudent to wait just a little. Here’s our list of the upcoming smartphones in July 2025 to present you with a clearer picture of what’s to come and help you make an informed buying decision.
title: Upcoming Smartphones in July 2025: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, Nothing Phone 3, OnePlus Nord 5 and More
